item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18886)
item.content:encoded:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere

Gaby has been an incredible advocate not only for herself but other families in sanctuary for all, she has helped other families cook their solidarity meals and... flyer the neighborhood about our events! We are so grateful to everything she brings to sanctuary for all, support her fight and help keep her here by ordering solidarity meals this Saturday! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

item.title: Con demasiada frecuencia, los medios estadounidenses presentan a...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Con demasiada frecuencia, los medios estadounidenses presentan a los inmigrantes indocumentados como víctimas indefensas, pero eso no es la verdad. En esta fascinante presentación, Jeanette Vizguerra cuenta su historia de cruzar la frontera, encontrar trabajo en los Estados Unidos y luchar por sus derechos. Es una historia de lucha, de dificultades, de coraje, de determinación y, sobre todo, de resistencia. Jeanette Vizguerra es una orgullosa mujer mexicana, madre y abuela co...n 23 años en los Estados Unidos como inmigrante. Se mudó a los Estados Unidos para ser conserje, trabajó como organizadora sindical y construyó su propia empresa. Después de ocho años de luchar contra la deportación, hizo pública su historia y buscó refugio en First Unitarian Society of Denver. Fundó Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition, Sanctuary4All y Abolish ICE Denver. Fue nombrada una de las 100 personas más influyentes de la revista Time en 2017, pero sigue siendo un ser simple y humilde lleno de sueños e ideas.

//

Too often the US media portrays undocumented immigrants as helpless victims, but that is not the truth. In this fascinating presentation, Jeanette Vizguerra tells her story of crossing the border, finding work in the United States, and fighting for her rights. After eight years of fighting deportation, she went public with her story and sought refuge with the First Unitarian Society of Denver. She founded Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition, Sanctuary4All, and Abolish ICE Denver. She was named one of Time Magazine's 100 Most Influential People in 2017, but she remains a simple and humble being full of dreams and ideas.

¡Mira aquí! // Watch here!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PboUY0A-JYQ

See MoreAll too often, American media presents undocumented immigrants as defenseless victims, but that's not the truth. In this fascinating presentation, Jeanette Vizguerra tells her story of crossing the border, finding work in the United States, and fighting for her rights. It's a story of struggle, of struggles, of courage, determination and above all of resilience. Jeanette Vizguerra is a proud Mexican woman, mother and grandmother aged 23 in the United States as an immigrant. She moved to the United States to be a janitor, worked as a union organizer and built her own company. After eight years of fighting deportation, he made public his story and sought refuge at First Unitarian Society of Denver. Founded Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition, Sanctuary4All and Abolish ICE Denver. It was named one of Time Magazine's 100 most influential people in 2017, but it remains a simple and humble being full of dreams and ideas. // Too often the US media portrays undocumented immigrants as helpless victims, but that is not the truth. In this fascinating presentation, Jeanette Vizguerra tells her story of crossing the border, finding work in the United States, and fighting for her rights. After eight years of fighting deportation, she went public with her story and sought refuge with the First Unitarian Society of Denver. She founded Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition, Sanctuary4All, and Abolish ICE Denver. She was named one of Time Magazine's 100 Most Influential People in 2017, but she remains a simple and humble being full of dreams and ideas. En esta f...

youtube.com

item.title: Gaby has been an incredible advocate not only for herself but...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Gaby has been an incredible advocate not only for herself but other families in sanctuary for all, she has helped other families cook their solidarity meals and flyer the neighborhood about our events! We are so grateful to everything she brings to sanctuary for all, support her fight and help keep her here by ordering solidarity meals this Saturday! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoColorado Public Radio was live.WATCH LIVE: President Biden is touring the National Renewable Energy Laboratory in...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoColorado Public Radio was live.

WATCH LIVE: President Biden is touring the National Renewable Energy Laboratory in Golden and speaking about the infrastructure bill and the Build Back Better plan.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Today President Biden will be at National Renewable Energy...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Today President Biden will be at National Renewable Energy Laboratory. He will be leaving Colorado at 5pm and it is a great opportunity for community to be present to send a message with all the topics that affect us. Community stand up and fight! 15013 Denver West Pkwy
Golden, CO 80401
United States
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Yess
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Yess

The Hudson County Correctional Facility in New Jersey says it will no longer detain people for Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), Documented reports. Local officials had expressed openness to ending the county’s agreement with ICE this past...

dailykos.com

'Major win for the immigrant justice movement': New Jersey county says it's ending ICE contract

The Hudson County Correctional Facility in New Jersey says it will no longer detain people for Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), Documented reports. Local officials had expressed openness to ending the county’s agreement with ICE this past...The Hudson County Correctional Facility in New Jersey says it will no longer detain people for Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), Documented reports. Local officials had expressed openness to ending the county’s agreement with ICE this past...
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Gaby has been fighting for over a year in this country to be...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Gaby has been fighting for over a year in this country to be with her children. Support her struggle by buying tacos dorados de papa, flautas de pollo, or cheesecake. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

Gaby has been fighting for over a year alone in this country, has been a member for over a year at Sanctuary for All, and continues to fight to be here with her children. supports her struggle by buying food that week after week each family cooks lovingly for you.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Please share and suport
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Please share and suport

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn’t operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…. Please share, support, and pray for her full recovery. ❤️

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

This Saturday Yessenia will be selling tamales and cake! Get your order in soon for some delicious treats and to help support Yessenia and her family! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn’t operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…. Please share, support, and pray for her full recovery. ❤️

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Jeanette Vizguerra, one of the amazing undocumented mothers in...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Jeanette Vizguerra, one of the amazing undocumented mothers in my film Sanctuary Rising, was in a scary car accident yesterday.

Amazingly she's ok, with family, and recovering now💗💗💗

Jeanette is going to miss a bunch of work, as well as have medical expenses--I wanted to ask for support from the community to help Jeanette and her kids to get through this difficult time.

...

Please Venmo Jeanette directly: @Sanctuary-4-All

https://account.venmo.com/u/Sanctuary-4-All

Mil Gracias:))) From Theo Rigby

Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn’t operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…. Please share, support, and pray for her full recovery. ❤️
